Variable._Comments: Tenant ID of Azure Active Directory
Variable.Name: AADTenantId

Variable._Comments: Stored Credentials of Azure Service Principal GUID or Username
Variable.Name: AADApplicationId

Variable._Comments: use AADServicePrincipalSecret filed for testing only, set via New-StoredCredential
Variable.Name: AADServicePrincipalSecret

Variable._Comments: Subscription Id of the Azure
Variable.Name: currentAzureSubscriptionId

Variable._Comments: The name of the tenant group in the Windows Virtual Desktop deployment
Variable.Name: tenantGroupName

Variable._Comments: The name of the tenant in the Windows Virtual Desktop deployment.
Variable.Name: tenantName

Variable._Comments: The name of the WVD Host Pool
Variable.Name: hostPoolName

Variable._Comments: Hostpool session Load Balancing Type in Peak Hours
Variable.Name: peakLoadBalancingType

Variable._Comments: Name of the maintenance Tag
Variable.Name: maintenanceTagName

Variable._Comments: RDbroker URL
Variable.Name: rdBroker

Variable._Comments: Stored Credentials of Username or WVD service Principal GUID
Variable.Name: userName

Variable._Comments: use Password filed for testing only, set via New-StoredCredential
Variable.Name: password

Variable._Comments: Accepted values True/False, True indicate service principal is being used to authenticate to WVD
Variable.Name: isWVDServicePrincipal

Variable._Comments: Begin of the peak usage time
Variable.Name: beginPeakTime

Variable._Comments: End of the peak usage time
Variable.Name: endPeakTime

Variable._Comments: Time difference between local time and UTC, in hours(Example: India Standard Time is +5:30)
Variable.Name: timeDifferenceInHours

Variable._Comments: Maximum number of sessions per CPU threshold used to determine when a new RDSH server needs to be started
Variable.Name: sessionThresholdPerCPU

Variable._Comments: Minimum number of host pool VMs to keep running during off-peak usage time
Variable.Name: minimumNumberOfRDSH

Variable._Comments: Number of seconds to wait before forcing users to logoff. If 0, don't force users to logoff
Variable.Name: limitSecondsToForceLogOffUser

Variable._Comments: Message title sent to a user before forcing logoff
Variable.Name: logOffMessageTitle

Variable._Comments: Message body to send to a user before forcing logoff
Variable.Name: logOffMessageBody
Variable.Value: Please save your work and logoff!
